---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report or request maintenance tasks
title: ''
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the maintenance task**
A clear and concise description of what maintenance is needed.

**Reason for maintenance**
Explain why this maintenance is required (e.g. dependency updates, performance improvements, security patches, cleanup).

**Impact**
Describe any expected impact or downtime during maintenance.

**Additional context**
Add any other context, links, or references related to this maintenance task.
